knimeNode.name: Slimm DB
knimeNode.shortDescription: Gets a reduced taxonomic information given a multi-fasta file using accession numbers

intro.p: SLIMM Species Level Identification of Microbes from Metagenomes

fullDescription.option: Maximum number of mapping to load to memory. (default=1000000)

ports.inPort: A multi-fasta file used as a reference for mapping [fq,fq.bgzf,fq.gz,fq.bz2,fastq,fastq.bgzf,fastq.gz,fastq.bz2,fa,fa.bgzf,fa.gz,fa.bz2,fasta,fasta.bgzf,fasta.gz,fasta.bz2,faa,faa.bgzf,faa.gz,faa.bz2,ffn,ffn.bgzf,ffn.gz,ffn.bz2,fna,fna.bgzf,fna.gz,fna.bz2,frn,frn.bgzf,frn.gz,frn.bz2,embl,embl.bgzf,embl.gz,embl.bz2,gbk,gbk.bgzf,gbk.gz,gbk.bz2,raw,raw.bgzf,raw.gz,raw.bz2,sam,sam.bgzf,sam.gz,sam.bz2,bam]
ports.outPort: The path to the output file (default slimm_db.sldb) [sldb]

views.view: The text sent to standard out during the execution of SlimmDB.
The text sent to standard error during the execution of SlimmDB. (If it appears in gray, it's the output of a previously failing run which is preserved for your trouble shooting.)
